name: Han's Toolkit (V)
Lore: 'Experienced pilots keep a well equipped toolkit. Horizontal boosters, alluvial dampers and hydrospanners aid in performing high-tech repairs aboard starships.',
Text: 'Deploy on Falcon or Han. While Han piloting Falcon at a battleground, non-immune to Alter Effects (except Emperor''s Power, Presence of the Force, and Search And Destroy) are suspended.',
